## CopyrightElementHandler.setDefaults() method

Set \[\[CopyrightInfo\]\] defaults to be used in case \[\[DataSource\]\] does not provide deatailed copyright information.

The defaults will applied to all undefined `year`<!-- -->, `label` and `link` values in the copyright information retrieved from \[\[MapView\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setDefaults(defaults: CopyrightInfo[] | undefined): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  defaults | [CopyrightInfo](./harp-mapview.copyrightinfo.md)<!-- -->\[\] \| undefined |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

this
